Posts.Content: Hi I have had two lumpectomies with a very clear tissue  margin report on the second lumpectomy when I went to see radiologist.  He left me wondering if I would need radiation or is that over treatment.  I know That I will not need the punch at the end he said. I am seeking comments that will help me to decide if I should have radiation or do alternative such latreal (vitamin B 17)  I appreciate all your comments and God Bless each of you
Posts.Title: Radiation for DCIS
